title: [Bug]: Microphone Volume keeps changing
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

Not applicable

### Describe the bug

My microphone volume keeps changing, sometimes spiking to 100% for no reason or hitting 10% where no one can hear me.

### What package are you using?

flatpak

### Version

2.0.17

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
1. Open Teams
2. Speak into the micrphone
3. Check that Mic volume level changes almost every time you speak
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
1. Mic Level stays the same
```

### Debug

```markdown

```

### Additional context

There is an extension that solves this issue: [Disable Automatic Gain Control](https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/disable-automatic-gain-co/clpapnmmlmecieknddelobgikompchkk)
